nodes.text: The Kashyyyk long-gun (also called Wookiee rifle) was a long-barreled rifle used by the Wookiees of Kashyyyk.

Kashyyyk long-guns first appeared in the 2005 movie Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. They made a second appearance in "Wookiee Hunt," the twenty-second and final episode of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series' third season.

A piece of concept art for the long-guns appearing that episode, drawn by Wayne Lo, mistakenly identifies them as bowcasters. However, the Concept Art Gallery for "Wookiee Hunt" on StarWars.com correctly labels them as Wookiee rifles.
